entities.name: MICROSOFT
entities.description: Microsoft is a leading global technology company offering a wide range of services and products, including software, hardware, and cloud computing solutions. The company is headquartered in Redmond, Washington, and has a comprehensive benefits package for its employees.

entities.name: REDMOND, WASHINGTON
entities.description: Redmond, Washington is the location of Microsoft's headquarters, where on-demand COVID-19 testing and vaccinations were offered during the pandemic.
